metadata.name: Silver Falls
metadata.description:
This animated 360ยบ image of the Upper North Falls in Silver Falls State Park in Oregon is comprised of 26 separate photos taken by a drone 400 feet from the ground. The series of photographs are then meticulously stitched together in post production resulting in the final image seen here.

Purchase of this NFT will provide access to the 4k resolution version of the animated image and the 16k resolution version of the still image in square, 3x4, and 9x16 formats for optimum display on various digital or physical medium formats.
